entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:59 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 1:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
